node.title: Roger Federer to miss Australian Open as he continues recovery from surgery
node.alt: A Swiss male tennis players wipes his face with his right hand at the French Open.
node.description: The six-time Australian Open champion will be an absentee in Melbourne in January and he also expects to be sidelined fromÂ next year's Wimbledon tournament.
node.content: ["Roger Federer has confirmed he will not play in next January's Australian Open, as he continues his recovery from his most recent knee operation.", "The 20-time major singles champion \u2014 who has won the Australian Open on six occasions \u2014 told Swiss media he might also miss the 2022 Wimbledon tournament, which begins in late June.", "Federer last played a competitive match last July when he lost\u00a0in the quarter-finals\u00a0at Wimbledon.", "More to come."]
